body.p:
Hopkinsville Ky Nov 9th 1860
Gov B Magoffin
Frankfort Ky
We enclose herewith a petition fon behalf of Messrs Garth & Dickerson of Todd Co which explains itself --
We know the facts stated in the petition to be true & would respectfully urge upon your Excellency the propriety of Executive interposition

We enclose also a letter from Hon H. J. Stites & one from the Commwlths atty -- Our Circuit Judge Hon Thos C. Dabney has promised to address your Excellency relative to this matter & we presume
(over)
has done so --
Will you have the kindness to let us know your conclusion in the premises by letter addressed to us at Hopkinsville Ky.

Very Respcty
Your Obdt svts
Petree & Bristow
